name: Galaxy Themes Studio Template
description:
Galaxy Themes Studio is Samsungâ€™s UI design tool, available to approved designers, for creating and selling mobile device UI themes, wallpapers, and icon packs.


This file is a manual conversion of their sample PSD files for submission. Converted assets include:

  • Auto-Layout frames
  • Componentized UI
  • Easy links & instructions on submission process
  • Simplified assets for text/UI swap


Authors Notes

I was going to try and create my own theme (as I just acquired a Galaxy S21 Ultra) and I figured if I was going to go through all this work converting a file into figma, I may as well share it with the community. Who know, perhaps you too will be on your way creating assets for your new theme!


-----


Additional Details on Galaxy themes studio and process can be found below:

  • Overview
  • Getting Started
  • Original Starter Kit (zip contains 1 png, 1 psd, 1 pdf)
